nodes.text: David Fentiman is an author of Star Wars young-readers titles. Along with Sadie Smith, he wrote and edited the young-readers activity book Ultimate Factivity Collection: Star Wars. Fentiman's other titles include Ultimate Sticker Collection: Star Wars Rebels, Star Wars Rebels: Fight the Empire, Star Wars: The Force Awakens: New Adventures, Finn's Mission, The Adventures of BB-8, and The Amazing Book of Star Wars.[source?] He is the author of the upcoming children's canon reference book Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker: Amazing Sticker Adventures, which will be published on October 4, 2019 as part of the Triple Force Friday merchandising event.
